faq.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED
faq.description: Everything you need to know about MOSE, shipping and returns

items.question: How do MOSE garments fit?
items.answer: Our clothing fits true to size. We recommend ordering your usual size. Unsure between two sizes? Choose the larger size for a relaxed fit. All sizes are designed for optimal comfort.

items.question: What are the shipping costs and delivery time?
items.answer: Shipping within the Netherlands and Belgium is free from ‚Ç¨{freeShipping}. Below that you pay ‚Ç¨{shippingCost}. Orders are processed and shipped within 1-2 business days. Delivery then takes 1-3 business days via PostNL.

items.question: Can I return my order?
items.answer: Yes! You have {returnDays} days to return from receipt. Returns are free and easy. Items must be unworn with tags still attached. Fill in the return form in your package and send it back. You'll receive your refund within 5 business days.

items.question: How do I care for my MOSE clothing?
items.answer: Wash at 30¬∞C inside out, do not use bleach and preferably do not tumble dry. Iron at low temperature if necessary. This way your MOSE garment will stay beautiful for years.

items.question: Is MOSE really locally produced?
items.answer: Absolutely! All our clothing is 100% produced in the Netherlands, mainly in Groningen. We work together with a local atelier that shares our quality standards. No long transport chains, just fair production.

items.question: Which payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept iDEAL, Mastercard, Visa, American Express, PayPal and Bancontact. All payments are securely processed via Stripe. Your payment details are always protected.

intro.title: 1. INTRODUCTION
intro.content: MOSE (mosewear.com) respects the privacy of all visitors to the website and ensures that the personal information you provide is treated confidentially. This privacy policy explains what data we collect and what we use it for.

dataCollection.title: 2. WHAT DATA DO WE COLLECT?
dataCollection.intro: We collect the following personal data:
items: Name and address (for shipping orders)
Email address (for order confirmations and communication)
Phone number (for delivery and customer service)
Payment details (securely processed via Stripe, not stored by us)
Order history and preferences

dataUsage.title: 3. WHAT DO WE USE YOUR DATA FOR?
items: Processing and shipping your orders
Communication about your order (confirmation, shipping, tracking)
Customer service and support
Improving our website and services
Marketing (only with your consent)

dataRetention.title: 4. HOW LONG DO WE KEEP YOUR DATA?
dataRetention.content: We do not retain your personal data longer than necessary for the purposes for which it was collected. We keep order data for 7 years in accordance with tax legislation. You can always request deletion of your data via

thirdParties.title: 5. SHARING WITH THIRD PARTIES
thirdParties.intro: We only share your data with:
items: Shipping partners (for delivery of your order)
Stripe (for secure payment processing)
Hosting providers (for data storage)
thirdParties.outro: We never sell your data to third parties and only share it when necessary for fulfilling your order.

security.title: 6. SECURITY
security.content: We take the protection of your data seriously and have implemented appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against loss or unlawful processing. We use SSL encryption for all data transfer and secure servers for storage.

cookies.title: 7. COOKIES
cookies.content: We use functional cookies that are necessary for the proper functioning of the website (such as your shopping cart). We ask for your consent for analytical cookies. You can always refuse cookies through your browser settings.

rights.title: 8. YOUR RIGHTS
items: Request access to your personal data
Have your data corrected or deleted
Object to processing
Transfer your data (data portability)
rights.outro: Contact us via {email} to exercise these rights.

changes.title: 9. CHANGES
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. You can always find the most recent version on this page. We will communicate important changes via email.

general.title: 1. GENERAL
general.content: These terms and conditions apply to all offers and agreements of MOSE (mosewear.com), located in Groningen, Netherlands. By placing an order, you agree to these terms.

pricing.title: 2. OFFERS AND PRICES
items: All prices are in euros and include VAT
Shipping costs are listed separately at checkout
Free shipping from ‚Ç¨{threshold} within the Netherlands and Belgium
Prices and stock may change without prior notice

ordering.title: 3. ORDERING
ordering.content: Your order is only final after we have sent an order confirmation by email. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel orders, for example in case of incorrect prices or suspected abuse.

payment.title: 4. PAYMENT
items: Payment is processed securely via Stripe
We accept iDEAL, credit card and Bancontact
Your payment must be completed before we ship your order
Failed payments will automatically cancel your order

shipping.title: 5. SHIPPING
items: Orders within the Netherlands are shipped via DHL
Delivery time is 2-5 business days within the Netherlands and Belgium
You will receive a track & trace code upon shipment
Shipping costs: ‚Ç¨4.95 (free from ‚Ç¨{threshold})

returns.title: 6. RETURNS
items: You have {days} days cooling-off period from receipt
Products must be unworn and in original condition
Returns are free within the Netherlands and Belgium
Return shipments are processed within 5 business days

warranty.title: 7. WARRANTY
warranty.content: All products come with a 2-year manufacturer warranty against material and manufacturing defects. This warranty does not cover normal wear and tear or damage from improper use.

liability.title: 8. LIABILITY
liability.content: MOSE is not liable for indirect damage or consequential damage arising from the use of our products, unless there is intent or gross negligence.

disputes.title: 9. DISPUTES
disputes.content: Dutch law applies to all agreements. Disputes will be submitted to the competent court in Groningen.
